data.title: Trains Letchworth Garden City to Boston
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Letchworth Garden City to Boston in 2hÂ 3m. Compare prices, view live journey times & book cheap train tickets for Letchworth Garden City to Boston.
data.text:
Looking to travel from Letchworth Garden City to Boston by train? You've come to the right place!

On average, it takes around 2 hours 58 minutes to travel from Letchworth Garden City to Boston by train, the fastest services can get you there in as little as 2 hours 3 minutes though. You'll usually find 14 trains per day running along the 69 miles (112 km) route between these two destinations. You'll need to make 2 changes during the journey to Boston, as there currently aren't any direct services on this route. You can choose to travel with London North Eastern Railway, East Midlands Railway or Thameslink to get to Boston. As the main rail operators on this route, their trains offer modern comfortable seating and plenty of space for luggage as standard.

To help you get great train deals, we'll highlight the cheapest train ticket prices from Letchworth Garden City to Boston in our Journey Planner. Just remember, as well as travelling Off-Peak or using a Railcard, the sooner you book your tickets, the more you'll save!

Want to book your train tickets now? Just start a search with us today. If you want to find out more about the journey, scroll up for timetables including live train times, or keep reading for FAQs and tips on how to book cheap train tickets.
